name: Calvin GARRETT, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE; John Kerestes, Superintendent of SCI Mahanoy; Kris D. Calkins, RS2 Records Dept. of SCI Mahanoy; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees
name_abbreviation: Garrett v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Calvin GARRETT, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE; John Kerestes, Superintendent of SCI Mahanoy; Kris D. Calkins, RS2 Records Dept. of SCI Mahanoy; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of February, 2013, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Calvin Garrett, Frackville, PA, pro se.
Jason Anthony Lambrino, Harrisburg, PA, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
Debra S. Rand, PA Department of Corrections, Mechanics-burg, PA, for Kris D. Calkins, Department of Corrections, and John Kerestes.
casebody.head_matter:
64 A.3d 1058
Calvin GARRETT, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE; John Kerestes, Superintendent of SCI Mahanoy; Kris D. Calkins, RS2 Records Dept. of SCI Mahanoy; Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, Appellees.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 19, 2013.
Calvin Garrett, Frackville, PA, pro se.
Jason Anthony Lambrino, Harrisburg, PA, for Pennsylvania Board of Probation and Parole.
Debra S. Rand, PA Department of Corrections, Mechanics-burg, PA, for Kris D. Calkins, Department of Corrections, and John Kerestes.
